description:
8 is a difficult RPG, point-and-click game, with several puzzles and enemies that will stimulate all your senses so that you can progress. Face a wide variety of choices that will change your future in the game. Decide wisely to get the best possible outcome.

Story:

One day, on a Sunday morning, a married mother decides to take her children to church. The husband said he was tired and decided to stay. The mother, when she arrived at the church, realized that she had forgotten the bible at home, and went back to get it. Arriving home she finds her husband cheating on her with her friend. She can’t resist the pain and dies of a heart attack.

Then her soul goes to the crossing. And when she was about to reach the spiritual world, someone pulls her away. It was the death. A beautiful girl. She tells a story of her past. According to her, hundreds of years ago, she lived happily with a dragon. He was her best companion and friend. But one day, she got sick and died. Since then she is alone, and misses her beloved dragon. She then proposes to revive the mother with one condition. She asks her to kill the dragon so that the dragon can live with her between the spiritual world and the world of the living.

The mother, full of sadness that she lost her life and the company of her children, accepts without blinking.

So now they have a deal, and a GREAT adventure ahead.

Important information about the game:


  • Attention, the game automatically saves all your moves. So when you want to stop playing, just close the game.

  • The game has no texts. You will need to use creativity and logical thinking to understand the game and its objectives.

  • Use your items wisely, or they will run out and you won’t be able to progress.

  • You can be bad or good in the game. This affects the way the game reacts to you. Sometimes it’s good to be bad, and sometimes it’s good to be good. Sometimes it’s good to be balanced.

  • Keep in mind that dying is normal, if the game have become too hard its better for you to go back to the beginning (you will not lose some items and powers). In fact, it would be very difficult to beat the game without dying and coming back at least once, or twice. Try to go as far as possible, and then come back full of wisdom and power :)
